title: Set up security questions
description: Answer 3 security questions to help keep your account secure.
requirementsTitle: Your answers should be hard for others to guess:
question: Question
firstQuestion: Enter the first security qestion and answer[FR]
secondQuestion: Enter the second security qestion and answer[FR]
thirdQuestion: Enter the third security qestion and answer[FR]

banner.title: We’ve added protection to keep your account and forms safe.
banner.body: You’ll need to enter a security code to access GC Forms.

success.title: Your security questions have been saved
